name: Wedding
short_description: Celebrate the union of two hearts in a grand and elegant wedding ceremony. Our wedding package includes everything you need to make your special day unforgettable, from stunning decor to gourmet catering.

name: Birthday Party
short_description: Host a lively and fun-filled birthday party for your loved ones. Our birthday party package offers a fantastic venue, entertainment, and delicious food, ensuring a memorable celebration.

name: Anniversary
short_description: Rekindle your love and cherish the years together with a romantic anniversary celebration. Our anniversary package includes a candlelit dinner, live music, and a beautiful ambiance.

name: Engagement Party
short_description: Celebrate the beginning of a beautiful journey with an enchanting engagement party. Our package includes a stunning venue, engagement photo shoot, and delicious hors d'oeuvres.

name: Retirement Party
short_description: Bid farewell to a well-deserved retirement with a heartwarming retirement party. Our package includes speeches, awards, and a delightful retirement cake.

name: Baby Shower
short_description: Welcome a new life with joy and excitement at a charming baby shower. Our package offers games, baby-themed decorations, and a special gift for the mom-to-be.
